data.body: Fix the sounds to be more like they were in Tiberian Dawn

data.title: Repairable bridges
data.body: Recently discovered https://github.com/chrisforbes/OpenRA/compare/bridge-repair. It won't work yet as bridges are not targetable by engineers because they are not regular buildings, but some kind of special terrain. Similar issue is #2097 that they can't be attacked with missile subs and C4.

data.title: ARM: should be expanded
data.body:
Right now, ARM: only defines minimum distance. What I would like it to do it also have an option to:

a. Not display trail and contrail while arming
b. while arming, not home into a target
c. While arming, go a set speed before going to the normal speed
d. Have two sounds: One for firing, one for armed.

data.title: Missile logic should not force IMAGE: to be defined
data.body:
Right now, the missile logic forces IMAGE: to be defined. I don't want to use IMAGE in my implementation of the missile logic, which is realistic bulleted weapons. 

Basically if I try to not define it, the game crashes when it attempts to fire, with a graphics crash defined in exceptions.

data.title: Flak trucks should prioritize airborne targets
data.body: since they don't do squat against tanks and such and take too much microing in a skirmish now if there's airplanes involved.

data.title: Change of map folder, where is my map?
data.body:
I cannot enter openra, since a bad map crashes it.
Where is the map? 

http://imgur.com/SwxApz3
This is false, the file it not there after I saved it in the editor....

And it's also too many crashes for faulty maps..... Some new players make map, and will never get this to work, and gives up...

data.title: Add a Fog: trait to enable fog of war in ShroudRenderer
data.body:
This makes fog of war conditional for nostalgic mappers and classic mods. It was the reason https://github.com/Iran/ClassicRA forked us and has been requested multiple times by die-hard fans of the original:
- http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&t=16023
- http://cnc-comm.com/community/index.php?topic=1619.msg12285#msg12285
- http://forum.dune2k.com/topic/24184-opend2k-cross-platform-reimplementation-of-dune-2000/?p=377815

data.title: Allow husks of destroyed units and buildings in maps
data.body:
Earlier, husks have resulted in map not loading ,
we want it fixed and back..

Nice to decorate maps...

http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&t=16100

data.title: Destructible trees for both CnC and RA mod
data.body:
The branch name is misleading as the trees won't burn yet. Still it uses the nice death animation for the trees that were unused before. Already makes throwing napalm and nukes on the landscape a lot more plausible.

Moving the `DeadBuildingState` into OpenRA.Mods.RA.dll also helps Harisson with [Red Alert Building Husk](http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&p=284337).

This might change game-play if mappers use trees not only for decoration, but also to block paths. They need to reverse my changes in map.yaml then.

data.title: Dynamic Gap Generator / Mobile Gap Generator
data.body:
Recently we have been frustrated with how gap generators can be abused; one can simply build a gap generator, power it down immediately, and the effect stays (as long as you don't have GPS, of course). This seems like a power management exploit against the way gap generators create and contribute to the shroud.

In response, this pull request changes gap generator shroud creation slightly to make it dynamic; when powered down or destroyed, the shroud that it created disappears as well. This shroud is in addition to the "explored" shroud, so if a player has not explored an area, they will not gain exploration simply because a gap generator has been destroyed.

This, of course, paves the way to enable Mobile Gap Generators, which @ScottNZ has graciously been working on recently. The second commit in this pull request enables the mobile gap generators and gives them a shroud creation range of 4.

data.title: Make volkov vulnerable to Anti-Personnel mines, and immune to anti-tank mines
data.body: Why is volkov immune to Anti-Personnel mines, but is killed by Anti-Tank mines? Reverted as this violates set principles and is un-realistic and un-RAlistic

data.title: Allow RA2 and Generals style Veterancy options
data.body:
Right now, veterancy doesn't do much in the way of unit stats. I say we should have the options found in Red Alert 2 and Generals, for example:

Adding and/or changing weapons to vehicles, infantry, and buildings. For example, a heroic rifle infantry not only has a far more powerful rifle, but also anti-tank grenades.
Changing the colour of weapons and weapon contrails. For example, a Herioc artillery could have Red Contrails with a Red Shell
Changing the armour value. A heroic rocket infantry could have armour that is immune to being run over.
Adding Ability to self-heal, as in #2599

data.title: New map updates/storing/deleting/information
data.body:
Thinking about the new auto map download, lets start a wishlist for things we then need, and later also wants.

1: auto removal / deleting / renaming / moving of maps with issues.. If the map gets reported on content as crashing map / pathfinding does not work, what to do?
What happends if they update the map? 
Could we get some lines from content about this map? Or just vote from content?

2: when I create maps, I name them 01 02 03, when browsing, it only shows title, that is the same many times.. 
..Confusing, can we solve this?

3: The maps should be moved to another folder on windows, caused by read only problems for some users. If maps include audio the files can be big, where should them be moved later on?

4: Information about maps.. Not sure how the new map browser should be, but in game lobby waiting to start, there should be some information about the game, like "no ore trucks, collecting ore with choppers" 
Or "press here to view yaml" (great for getting ppl to learn that)

5: List playcount on all maps

6: turn on / of preview of maps.. Keep some secret?

data.title: Distinguish System Messages between Player Chat, fixes #2079
data.body:
- remove colons from system messages and don't call them Debug
- use Game.Debug() everywhere

data.title: Unable to pause single player missions
data.body: More a feature request than a bug, but currently, players are unable to pause single player games.

data.title: Enemies in missions give bounty
data.body:
Not sure if this is by design or not, but units in Allies01 give a bounty when killed. This is fixed by adding -GivesBounty: to the following list of units:
OILB
C1
C2
E1
E2
E3
E7
DOG
JEEP
3TNK
TSLA
STEK
BARR
WEAP
FACT
PROC
SILO
DOME
KENN
POWR

Also, the player starts with an (unusable) 5000 in credits. This can be fixed by adding
                PlayerResources:
                        InitialCash: 0

data.title: Use Markdown for Readme and Contributing Guidelines
data.body: This will use https://github.com/github/markup for the Readme and add a boiler plate pointing to https://github.com/blog/1184-contributing-guidelines when someone adds a new bug report or pull request.

data.title: Speedup of ClassicProductionQueue
data.body: Based upon pull request #9 to implement the often requested feature #2548. My attempt restricts this to the classic production queue only and also implements this solely for third-party mods and custom maps. As a reference I added a money map that emulates a popular gem map tank spam variant I saw on http://www.youtube.com/user/CCRedAlert1/videos

data.title: Update AI
data.body: This AI work with all mods. In it, I tried to implement support for most of the features (including aviation and support power). Includes third party FuzzyLogicLibrary from Dmitry Kaluzhny.

data.title: Add self-healing for all elite units
data.body: From forum suggestion.

data.title: Visualize waypoints set by the player
data.body: You can currently use Shift + Click to set waypoints for your units. There should be a flag (suggesting the one from the rally point) to visualize this.
